oldPrefixUsed.title: Slash Commands Update
description: {{COM:bot.name}} now uses **Slash Commands**! Try it by typing `/{{COM:commands.help}}`!
If you don't see any slash commands listed for {{COM:bot.name}}:
1. Check that you have the **Use Application Commands** permission in this channel.
2. Try kicking and [re-inviting {{COM:bot.name}}]({{COM:links.invite}}).
3. Join our [support server]({{COM:links.support}}) for help.
I don't have all permissions required to run that command here! Please check the server and channel permissions to make sure I have the following permissions.
Required permissions: {{PERMISSIONS}}

setupRequired.title: Setup Required!
setupRequired.description: Please run basic setup with `/setup` before using that command!

premiumRequired.title: Premium Required!
description: This command requires this server to have premium!

fields.name: Premium Commands
value: Subscribe to **{{REF:bot.name}} Premium** for access to our premium features!

voteRequired.title: Vote Required!
description: This command requires you to have voted in the past 24 hours!

footer.text: Don't want to vote? Disable voting for the whole server with {{REF:bot.name}} Premium!

invalidTimezone.title: Time Zone Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: Invalid time zone!
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker]({{REF:links.map}})!

invalidTimeZoneAbbreviation.title: Time Zone Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: Invalid time zone! Do not use timezone abbreviations!
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker]({{REF:links.map}})!
I don't have permission to send messages in {{CHANNEL}}!
Please allow me to **View Channel**, **Send Messages**, **Embed Links**, and **Add Reactions** in {{CHANNEL}}.

roleHierarchyError.title: Role Hierarchy Error!
description: The birthday role must be below {{BOT}}'s role.
Additional Note: {{BOT}}'s role must be higher than the users it is assigning the birthday role to.
Example Role Hierarchy:
`{{COM:bot.name}}'s Role`
`Birthday Role`
`Birthday User's Highest Role`
Essentially the bot is unable to give a role to someone with a higher role than them or give a role that is higher than the bot's.

birthdayRoleUsedWarning.title: Warning
birthdayRoleUsedWarning.description:
We have detected that __**{{AMOUNT}}**__ user(s) already have that role!
The Birthday Role should ONLY be the role that users GET on their birthday!

footer.text: The Bot removes the Birthday Role from users whose birthday it isn't!

birthdayRoleUsedError.title: Error
birthdayRoleUsedError.description:
We have detected that __**{{AMOUNT}}**__ users already have that role!
The Birthday Role should ONLY be the role that users GET on their birthday!

footer.text: The Bot removes the Birthday Role from users whose birthday it isn't!

errorEmbeds.devOnlyCommand: This command can only be used by developers.
errorEmbeds.serverOnlyCommand: This command can only be used in a server.

errorEmbeds.timezoneAbbreviation: Please do not use timezone abbreviations! Please try again.
errorEmbeds.rawAPIInteractionDataReceived: Please reinvite the bot with the guild scope. Join the support server for more support.
errorEmbeds.cooldownHit: You can only run this command {{AMOUNT}} time(s) every {{INTERVAL}}. Please wait before attempting this command again.

errorEmbeds.notInBlacklist: That {{TYPE}} is not in the blacklist!
